item.title: YouTube’s updated eraser tool removes copyrighted music without impacting other audio
item.description:
On July 4, YouTube released an updated eraser tool for creators so they can easily remove any copyrighted music from their videos without affecting any other audio such as dialogues or sound effects. YouTube chief Neal Mohan posted about the tool on X and said, “Good news, creators: our updated Erase Song tool helps you […]

item.title: TikTokker: My iPhone is too dim at the beach. This quirky solution appears to fix it.
item.description: A TikTokker complained about her iPhone dimming and overheating at the beach. Commenters poured in with a game-changing solution.

item.title: Master the guitar with the help of an LED chord learning system
item.description: Fret Zealot 2, an Indiegogo-funded guitar learning system, attaches to any guitar to help you learn in no time. Get it for 20% off now.
